name: Cave Runner (itch) (Sir. Syko)
description:
Promises of riches got you on this cave but now you are being chased by a Giant boulder!

Outrun this Boulder and reach the the reaches on the depths of the earth!

- Run until you get bored (which should be fairly quick)

- Difficulty increases over time (although not that much)

Press Spacebar or LMB to avoid obstacles when close to them
